name: Essex
address: 124 Rivington St, New York, NY 10002, USA

reviews.text: Do you want more 5-star Google reviews? Best of all, they‚Äôre free! We can provide as many as you need to help your business reach the top of Google Maps. Contact us on Telegram: @gthisjpeg
JENNY was a great server. Great service and great food

202508

The best environment and so inviting.  Appetizers on point, the hummus platter delicious.  The porterhouse and NY Strip steak, German potatoes, and the gralic mashed potatoes.
This establishment is absolutely outstanding.
Best bottomless drinks in town, Maria is the best. Will come again
Maria was the best!!
Request for John as your server! Incredibly nice and accommodating for our table.thank you Essex and John!‚Ä¶.he is the man!
Amazing service. I recommend the chicken skewers and Pinot Noir.
We came for a Bach party and Maria our waitress was the absolute best!! We had such a good time and the food was delicious ‚ó°Ãà we also had several food allergies that they took very seriously
Maria was an absolute pleasure!! Came here for brunch on my sisters bachelorette party & we loved having Maria as our waitress.

Essex was such a phenomenal experience. We went for a bachelorette party and the restaurant was gorgeous. The food and drinks were amazing and our server Maria did a phenomenal job. She made sure to celebrate our bride and provided top notch service and ensured the members with food allergies were taken care of accordingly. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre in the area!

Great food. Mary was great for our bottomless Brunch.

Sadly was very loud. Would have been 5/5 if it wasn‚Äôt blasting music.
Sofia is amazing! I came here for the bottomless brunch and she kept the energy and drinks flowing.  Would definitely come back again!

The experience was great. The set up and decor of the restaurant is amazing. From the minute of being seated Sofia was extremely attentive and provided amazing service. There was never a moment where I ever needed for anything. Sofia has an exceptional attention to detail and made sure we were comfortable - even down to making sure we have napkins, straws, condiments, etc. I will definitely be back.
Sofia is THAT GIRL. She is the one and only!!!!
Sophia was the best restaurant server ive ever experienced in my life (im 50) and i will come back only for her <3
Sofia was the absolute best server! A SLAY!
Sophia our server at Brunch was the best! Attentive and helpful. So much fun ü§©
Sophia was amazing!
Sofia at Essex Brunch was on top of it!! Thank you!
Sofia slayed for brunch!
I had such a good time at Essex brunch. And Sofia was the best and most attentive server ‚ù§Ô∏è
Brunch was great and Sofia kept the drinks flowing!
Sofia was an amazing server for brunch!
Best brunch!
Sophia was amazing!
Sophia!!!! Amazing!!
Jenny was so attentive and kept our drinks full the entirety of brunch! Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a lively spot for bottomless in the LES

Decided to go on a solo date here and I really enjoyed my time! The staff were so friendly and welcoming. The place itself is lovely, spacious with bar seating, table seating, making it perfect for a solo visit, a date night, or hanging out with friends.

The food was fantastic and full of flavor. The fried calamari was crispy and came with a delicious sauce. The rice and chicken skewers were absolutely tasty. I also loved the pineapple cake, it had the perfect balance of sweet pineapple and also tasted cornbread flavor too, but it was good and moist.

I‚Äôm not much of a drinker, but the Mango Lava Lamp drink was really good! This spot is a winner and I‚Äôll definitely be coming back, whether solo, on a date, or with friends.
Solid Spot. Excellent Steak

I tried their sweet and sour pork dish, and it was absolutely delicious perfectly balanced flavors, tender meat, and a touch of tang that kept every bite exciting. I paired it with a refreshing fruit cocktail, a mix of citrus and berry notes that matched the dish beautifully. The sweet and sour tones of both the food and drink complemented each other perfectly! The atmosphere was lively yet cozy a great weekend vibe with friendly staff and upbeat music. Service was quick and attentive, and my glass never went empty. Highly recommend Essex if you‚Äôre into bold, flavorful brunches with creative drinks.
Sophia was amazing! Loved the bacon and drinks. ‚ô•Ô∏è
Hreat service kevin was our waiter
Great brunch with Kevin
Awesome service by Kevin was great. He was very attentive
Kevin was the most amazing way that we have had a long time. Had an awesome time with our bottomless drinks a great food at Essex
Wonderful brunch experience with friends. Sophia was great! Very friendly and accommodating.
Sophia was the best waitress! The food was great but honestly she was the best part of the whole meal
Sophia was a gem! Excellent service. We never went more than a few seconds without a refilled drink. Truly impressive. Give her a raise.
Excellent food and service. Sophia was great!
Sophia was an excellent waitress! Food was great as well.
Sophia was great! The shakshuka was delicious. Not a long wait.
Great food, lovely service! Sophia took great care of us!
Sophia was a great server! Great time at Essex!
Sophia was the best!!!! We love you!
Sophia was awesome!!!!
Our server was hot. Totally perfection. I wanted to take him home. Food was good too!
Sophia is great!! She was so patient. I had the best experience!!
Our server was Sofia, the best server everrr

This place is a weekend brunch VIBE - amazing food, the bottomless drinks are surprisingly top notch, and Nicole was a fantastic server... We literally never saw the bottom of our glasses! Highly recommend 10/10!

Went for restaurant week and the food was (mostly) a hit. I ordered the eggplant option and honestly it tasted like ash in my mouth ‚Äîmy partner tried it too and he agreed. It was tough and just not really edible. The service was astounding and they kindly replaced my entree with the branzino which is what I should have ordered in the first place. Truly, it was astounding. Outside of restaurant week, I don‚Äôt think we could really justify the price for what we got, but everything was delicious. The staff was impeccable. The vibes are a good instagram moment.

Had such a great time here! The ambiance was really nice‚Äîrelaxed, stylish, and perfect for a weekend brunch. The mimosas were absolutely delicious, and the eggs Benedict were perfectly done‚Äîrich, flavorful, and just the right portion. Definitely a place I‚Äôll be coming back to. Highly recommend!

The bottomless brunch was amazing! The waitress, Helena, was FANTASTIC ! She was so accommodating, and she even brought out plates, knives, and forks so we could celebrate my friend‚Äôs birthday with a cake! I highly recommend coming here w a group of people‚Äî you will not be disappointed (especially if you have HELENA as a waitress!!!)

(Last visited September 4, 2023.) Hanging out in New York City for Labor Day weekend and it's time to brunch! So today we're on the lower east side and checking out Essex! Here's how it went...

Atmosphere/Appearance: This place is pretty big for a New York restaurant! It's elongated like most of them but it also has an upstairs! It's very elegant, chic and felt like, historic... maybe? Like, set back in the day a little bit. It was on the quieter side, but still felt energetic as we sat right at the bar near the door since it was so busy.

Service: We sat at the bar and we were well taken care of. I can't remember who took care of us, but they had our mimosas FULL-FULL. Like, with a meniscus on top. Lol. Serious stuff.

Food: I went with the Angus strip and salad which was decent. It could've used some more seasoning or salt, but the steak was cooked well and the salad felt healthy. It was filling, but didn't make me regret eating it. Lol. Most importantly, the mimosas just flowed and flowed. Bottomless was done to perfection here, that's why it's important to sit right at the bar! At the source! Lol.

Value: It's New York City and it's a nice restaurant. It's not going to be cheap. I think my wife and I spent just over $100.00 with tax and tip for each of us to have bottomless mimosas then our entrees. Totally worth it.

In conclusion, I liked it here and would totally come back! Check this place out if you're in the area.
My friends and I went there for happy hour. The drinks and food were great and we had a good time. The tables by the open window were really nice on a summer evening!

Sophia has been absolutely amazing! Her service is top-tier, and it‚Äôs clear she truly understands her customers. She‚Äôs always welcoming, attentive, and makes sure you‚Äôre taken care of at all times. Her customer service is outstanding, and her time management skills are impressive. I really enjoyed having her take care of us ‚Äî she made the experience smooth and enjoyable. I genuinely hope to see her managing this location in the near future. She deserves it!

I discovered ESSEX after a long and challenging workday while searching for a healthy, delicious meal during NYC Summer Restaurant Week‚Äîand I am so glad I did! The restaurant has a wonderful vibe: inviting, modern, and relaxing, perfect for unwinding after a busy day.

I started with the roasted baby heirloom carrots, and they were absolutely refreshing and full of flavor. The combination of sunflower seeds, hummus, and the delicate sweetness of the carrots created a perfect balance‚Äîlight yet satisfying.

For my main course, I chose the French cut organic chicken breast, which completely exceeded my expectations. It came with roasted peaches, an unexpected touch that blended beautifully with the savory flavors. Every bite felt thoughtfully crafted and memorable.

Even though I don‚Äôt usually eat dessert, I couldn‚Äôt resist trying the tahini butternut panna cotta after seeing it at another table. It was not overly sweet, just perfectly balanced, and the rich tahini flavor with the chocolate crumbles on the side took it to another level. It was a unique and delicious way to end my meal.

A special shout-out to my waiter, Juan (J-U-A-N). He was incredibly knowledgeable, attentive, and kind, making my experience even more enjoyable.

Overall, ESSEX is a gem‚ÄîI left feeling happy, satisfied, and already hoping to return soon. Highly recommended for anyone looking for creative, healthy, and flavorful dining in New York City!
Celebrated my 30th bday here and Sophia was our waitress, she was absolutely wonderful and we had an amazing time! We did bottomless brunch and our drinks were always filled :) thank you Sophia!!!
amazing brunch!! katie was so nice and really made sure we had a great time. The food was rlly good too!!

Love the food and the atmosphere of Essex! It‚Äôs a great spot to dine with friends after a long day of work! Love the Mac and cheese and the Essex burger with fries-it‚Äôs super filling! The salmon is really good too! The mango mojito mock-tail drinks are my go to and the toffee pudding is out of this world-especially with the scoop of vanilla ice cream to top it off! 10/10 would come back again!

Update: Essex recently renovated their space and it is STUNNING!! Go check it out!
Excellent vibes and delicious food! Helen was the best server. For sure will be coming back soon

Great brunch spot!! Drinks are consistently filled, food is great, and the music is fun. Eggs Benedict is one of my favorites. Our server, Sophia, was very friendly & provided us great service. Would definitely recommend!!
Relaxing atmosphere and delicious food ~ shared the first round of oysters and had the get a second for my self! Every bite is worth it

Had an amazing experience at Essex! The food was delicious, but what really made our brunch special was our waitress, Jenny. She was absolutely fantastic ‚Äî super nice, attentive, and incredibly fast. She anticipated what we needed before we even had to ask and made the whole dining experience smooth and enjoyable. It‚Äôs rare to get service this good, and Jenny really went above and beyond. Highly recommend Essex, and if you‚Äôre lucky enough to have Jenny as your server, you‚Äôre in for a treat!

The service was not great. Our server kept disappearing and multiple times the busboy who was untrained had to serve us leading to incorrect orders.

The food was ok - nothing special. I‚Äôm not sure if this was just an off day because all the other reviews were so great - but our experience was sub par.
Great happy hour at Essex on the Lower East Side, Sunday - Friday, 5-7.  We had several small plates: fried calamari, duck meatballs, oysters and 2 types of flatbreads.

The Essex is a beautiful restaurant in an interesting area of Manhattan. I came here for their Christmas Dinner offering which was $65 per person, a fantastic price compared to other restaurants.

The food was OK, with all of it being presented very nicely but some dishes disappointing in their taste. The NY Strip Steak was more rare than medium rare and the dessert was not appealing taste-wise.

The service here was splendid, with our waitress taking good care of our table despite it being a busy Christmas Day night, and another waiter filling up our water frequently.
I LOVE THIS PLACE, unlimited mimosa? More like like the whole bottle and a 1/2. Please come for brunch Jenny and Visoa OMG I‚Äôll be back next weekend

This was such a VIBE for a Saturday brunch!! We brought an out of town friend and some NYC friends and everyone loved it!! Our server Helena was GENUINELY a gem!!! The most attentive bottomless brunch bestie we‚Äôve ever met !! We will def come back!

First time here and wow. The atmosphere is calm, nice music and great service. Tried the Herb omelet and OMG it hit the spot. Happy hour included a lot of drinks options but wanted the endless mimosas. Went here with my girlfriends and can't wait to come back again.
Friday evening, a goup of 4 over-50's met for good food and conversation. We found both, though the background noise hampered the conversation.

Grabbed brunch here recently for the first time and it was such a great find! Our brunch was delicious, mimosas were great and the servers were friendly. Busy restaurant and can be a bit noisy but definitely a fun atmosphere! We will be back when in NYC again!
First time at Essex and Helena truly made the experience. Food was great, service was even better! Thanks for making a such a great visit

4.3 /5. Fun, rockin‚Äô Happy Hour. As I waited for my friends to arrive, the waiter was attentive and asked if I wanted to be served as she dropped off the menus. I got my drink & water before they arrived several minutes later. Water glasses were quickly filled and the waiter came by again to take drink and food orders. We started with the oysters, unfortunately, they were a bit small and not so tasty -  was not a fan of the sauces provided. I would probably try this again as it‚Äôs not really the season for oysters right now. The shrimp wantons was a table favorite, as was the calamari. The flatbread was small and just Ok. We ordered a second round of food as it was our dinner. The Manchego mac and cheese was outstanding! It was probably the best Mac n cheese I‚Äôve had at a restaurant with a healthy amount of cheese and perfectly prepared with a toasted top. The 3 of us were almost full but we managed to finish the very good truffle fries. I probably wouldn‚Äôt order the roasted peppers next time, even though they were prepared excellently. All the food arrived piping hot, which should be easy to do but most places don‚Äôt do this. The place was buzzy with people drinking but there was still room if you wanted to drink, arrive early for a table. Fantastic happy hour! Oct 2024
Loved our waitress Nicole! She was amazing! Kept our drinks always full. Made excellent recommendations! Food was delicious!

Everything we tried in the menu was delicious, I would say - great American classic dishes.

Served was nice and friendly and atmosphere was very chill

Service was amazing! Food is super delicious (ordered the avocado toast option and the avocado WAS OVER-FLOWING!!!). Our server, Jenny, was attentive and pleasant. The vibe was awesome and Viosa was incredible as well, since she made sure our glasses STAYED full for the unlimited mimosa.

We came across this restaurant last minute. It saved the night! We had reservations at another spot nearby but they were closed. And I‚Äôm so glad they were! The food at Essex was mindblowingly delicious! The sides were 10/10! So much so that I wish I‚Äôd eaten less so I could have fully finished the perfectly cooked steak. So so good. Great dinner to end a perfect night of birthday celebrations.

Place is amazing good music great envy. Really good proportion of food. Staff is friendly and great. My server was Cynthia she was wonderful really attentive. I loved Felipe too such a delight his desert was delicious. I want to marry him. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
I highly recommend this place.

This place is great and very low key. The service was perfect, and the food was also great. It's not pretentious and roomier than most other restaurants in the area. The mixed drinks were superb. I would like to see some other beers on the menu that are not draft choices. Keep up the good work, I'll be back.

Came here for restaurant week and everything was amazing and would definitely come here again!
Our server was super nice and friendly and the food was great!
We had the charred octopus, artisanal burrata, raw oysters steak, coconuts rice pudding and chocolate olive oil cake. You can‚Äôt go wrong with any of them! The oysters were only $2 each and it was even happy hour price or anything which is so hard to come by nowadays, the app and steak was superb! The desserts were great too but the dinner was just so good that that‚Äôs what left us wanting to go back!
Helena is the best waitress!! The best for bottomless brunch she was so quick
SOFIA IS AMAZING!!! Had brunch for my friends birthday and she made it so special!! The food is great and she always topped us off on bottomless! Loved it here!
We came in a party of 7 for brunch and Katie was our amazing waitress. Always making sure we were okay and filling our glass with the endless mimosas. She made sure everyone was happy!
Helena was an amazing server, food was delicious and drinks were great!
Sophia is a wonderful server. She rocked! She rocked! Wait, did I say that twice? That‚Äôs because she rocked she rocked twice times!!!! Go eat here. Ask for Sophia. Great food!

Katie was an amazing server. Great attitude,  always helpful. Knew the menu and was quick with any requests.
Brunch menu was great, all of our food was good for a Sunday rush brunch hour.
Burgers and Country Fried steak.
A bit of a wait, but worth it because Katie kept pouring those bottomless mimosas! Thank you! 2nd time here and will be back.

It was a delightful experience. The menu boasts classic American fare with a twist, and each dish is a flavorful journey. The laid-back atmosphere, combined with friendly service, creates a welcoming space for a casual meal or a night out.
Love the bar. Helena was amazing. Highly recommend for brunch!
Great place for brunch,  great atmosphere,  but brunch would not be complete without our awesome waitress, HELENA!!!! You made our brunch so special,  you are fantastic!! Thank you!!

The food was phenomenal, the service was amazing and it was great vibes. We did the bottomless brunch and they kept the drinks filled!! Victoria was the best waitress I have had in a very long time. She was amazing!
